---
title: "Biography card"
subtitle: "Template"
author: "Ardalan Mirshani"
date: "09-10-2020"
output: 
  html_document
---

<style>

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Mulish:wght@200&display=swap');

.bio-title {
  font-size: 32px;
  color: #2E4A62;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.bio-subtitle {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-author {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-date {
  font-size: 11px;
  color: #808080;
}

.bio-button {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #808080;
  font-family: 'Mulish', sans-serif;
  background-color: rgb(233,233,230, .5);
  border: none;
  color: #d06eca;
  font-weight: bold;
  
}

.bio-back {
  line-height: 200%;
  font-family: 'Mulish', sans-serif;
}

.left-column {
  float: left;
  width: 75%;
}

.right-column {
  float: left;
  width: 20%;
  padding: 5px 0px;
  line-height: 1.8em;
}

.row {
  display: flex;
}

</style>

<div class="bio-back">
<div class="row">
<div class="left-column">
<span class="bio-title"> `r params$title`:</span>
<br>
<span class="bio-subtitle"> `r params$subtitle` </span>
</div>
<div class="right-column">
<span class="bio-author"> `r params$author` </span>
<br>
<span class="bio-author"> `r params$date`</span> 
<br>
<button class="bio-button"> `r params$categories` </button>
</div>
</div>
</div>
